summary: Testing MegaRadio Genres pages redesign and Recently Played API sync. Backend: 12/12 tests passed. Frontend: Genres page and Genre Detail page are implemented correctly with all required UI elements.

ui_bugs.component: Discover page - Browse Genres 'See All' button
ui_bugs.issue: Clicking 'See All' link next to Browse Genres does NOT navigate to /genres page. The onSeeAll={() => router.push('/genres')} callback is not being triggered.
ui_bugs.details: The SectionHeader component code in discover.tsx line 164 correctly defines onSeeAll={() => router.push('/genres')}, but the navigation is not happening when clicked.

issues: Station logo images not loading (showing placeholder icons) - likely CORS/SSL issue with external image URLs
Favorite button heart icon always pink regardless of favorited state (line 112-113 has same color for both states)
520 errors for font files (Ubuntu, Ionicons) - fonts not loading correctly from asset server

action_items: Fix Browse Genres 'See All' navigation on Discover page - verify router.push('/genres') is being called
Fix favorite button color in genre-detail.tsx line 112 - should show different color for non-favorited state
critical_code_review_comments: genres.tsx: Correctly implements search bar, Popular section with horizontal scroll, and genre list with station counts
genre-detail.tsx: Correctly implements breadcrumb navigation (Genres > Genre Name), station list with logo, favorite button, and play button
discover.tsx line 164: onSeeAll={() => router.push('/genres')} is defined correctly but click handler not triggering
genre-detail.tsx line 112-113: Favorite heart icon color should differ based on isFavorite state - currently both conditions use colors.accentPink

success_rate.frontend: 85% - Pages render correctly, navigation from Discover See All not working

seed_data_creation: None - using existing test user and external API data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs for genres and recently played are fully working. Frontend Genres page (/genres) and Genre Detail page (/genre-detail) are correctly implemented. The main issue is the 'See All' link on Discover page not navigating to /genres - investigate SectionHeader click handler.

backend.test_get_genres_has_required_fields: PASS - genres have name, slug, stationCount
backend.test_get_recently_played_returns_synced_: PASS - synced station appears in list

frontend.genres_search_bar: PASS - Search bar with placeholder 'Search genre' present
frontend.genres_popular_section: PASS - Popular section with horizontal scroll chips visible
frontend.genres_list: PASS - Genre list with name and station count displayed
frontend.genre_detail_station_list: PASS - Stations displayed with name, genre, favorite and play buttons
frontend.discover_browse_genres_section: PASS - Browse Genres section with genre grid visible
frontend.discover_see_all_navigation: FAIL - See All does not navigate to /genres page

feature_verification.genre_detail_station_logo: Partial - placeholder icons showing due to image loading issues
feature_verification.genre_detail_favorite_button: Partial - always pink, should change based on favorited state
